mapper.select: SELECT cartno, cartgrpno, productno, orderID, productCount, rdate FROM cart WHERE cartgrpno=#{cartgrpno} ORDER BY cartno DESC
SELECT cartno, cartgrpno, productno, orderID, productCount, rdate FROM cart ORDER BY cartno DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cartno, cartgrpno, productno, orderID, productCount, rdate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(cartno),0) + 1 as cartno FROM cart), #{cartgrpno}, #{productno}, #{orderID}, #{productCount}, sysdate)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cartno = #{cartno} AND cartgrpno = #{cartgrpno}
mapper.select: SELECT c.cartno, c.cartgrpno, c.productno, c.orderID, c.productCount, c.rdate, p.pdcontentsno, p.title, p.thumb, p.price FROM cart c INNER JOIN pdcontents p ON c.productno = p.pdcontentsno WHERE cartgrpno = #{cartgrpno} ORDER BY cartno DESC
